name: plexgifmaker
description: PlexGifMaker is a self-hosted tool for generating GIF previews from Plex video items. Ideal for creating animated thumbnails or previews for media in personalized libraries.
features: GIF generation: Create animated GIF previews from video files in your Plex library.
Plex integration: Connect directly to Plex Media Server to access and process library content.
Custom timing: Configure GIF duration, start time, and frame rate for optimal preview quality.
Batch processing: Generate GIFs for multiple videos simultaneously to save time.
Quality settings: Adjust resolution, color depth, and compression for file size optimization.
Thumbnail creation: Automatically create GIF thumbnails for movies and TV episodes.
Scene detection: Intelligently select interesting scenes from videos for engaging previews.
Library organization: Organize generated GIFs by library, collection, or custom categories.
Web interface: Manage GIF generation and settings through a simple web-based UI.
Storage management: Configure output directories and automatic cleanup of old GIFs.
Preview before saving: Review generated GIFs before finalizing to ensure quality.
Scheduling: Automate GIF generation with scheduled tasks for new library additions.
